description:
LATEST: Course Updated January 2015
The course is priced at $15 until January 31st. The price will be going up on February 1st to $25


This course will allow you to pick up the basics of grammar, alongside with useful vocabulary and tips that will help you to cut the time spent learning useless sentences by heart.

You will be able to speak and actually being understood without having to use English. At the same time you will enjoy your learning experience.

The topics covered in this course are: articles, nouns, adjectives, personal subject pronouns, auxiliary verbs, regular verbs, irregular verbs, direct object pronouns, indirect object pronouns, modal verbs, relative pronouns, possessive adjectives and pronouns, reflexive pronouns, reflexive verbs, particles "ci" and "ne", degrees of adjectives, negative sentence, asking questions in Italian, imperfetto, passato prossimo, prepositions, futuro semplice, conjunctions and adverbs.
title: Friendly Italian: learn the basics in less than 1 month
